data.title: Records of the Cape Colony : from February 1793 to April 1831...
data.text:

Cape of Good Hope (South Africa)., & Theal, G. M. (18971905). Records of the Cape Colony: from February 1793 to April 1831 ; copied for the Cape Government from the manuscript documents in the Public Record Office, London . Printed for the Government of the Cape Colony.
